trans-unit.source: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: 所有的语音合成引擎文字可实现的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: 若要构造一个自定义文本到语音转换引擎，应用程序必须始终实现派生自抽象基类的类<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>。

trans-unit.source: A properly registered implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> can then be used as a synthesizer voice by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space based applications.
trans-unit.target: 正确注册的实现<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>然后可用作通过合成语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>命名空间基于应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Objects inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> must override the following members: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对象继承自<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>必须重写以下成员： <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.%23ctor%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The most important member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> class to be implemented is the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 最重要的成员<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>类实现是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>方法由基础结构文本分析器接收调用：

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>接口，从而提供对系统服务，如甚至队列以及编写音频输出的访问。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例生成语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 输入中。

trans-unit.source: In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance associated with each incoming <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
trans-unit.target: 除了要呈现为语音的文本，分析的 SSML 存储有关请求的属性的信息中的语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>与每个传入关联实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>对象。

trans-unit.source: A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A> to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output.
trans-unit.target: 语音合成器应用程序 （可选） 可以通过实现发出指定的输出格式的请求<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat%2A>时它将尝试提供正确的音频输出平台调用。

trans-unit.source: An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 实施者还可以用于管理其实现的外部定义的发音或词典，提供支持<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> 实现相关的语音标记的注册表项的全名。

trans-unit.source: engine.
trans-unit.target: 引擎。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.
trans-unit.target: 基于相应的语音标记注册表项构建新的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Calls to this constructor are typically generated by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications selecting a synthesizer voice to be used by an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此构造函数通常都由<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>基于选择合成语音的应用程序要使用的实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> must be register under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>必须是下 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens 寄存器。

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see langword="System.Uri" /> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: 指示词典信息位置的 <see langword="System.Uri" /> 的有效实例。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该词典的媒体类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Media types are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 媒体类型要区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 对用于与平台基础结构进行交互的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> 接口的引。

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implemented by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加词典到当前 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> 实例实现的 <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" />。

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 发音词典是集合的词或短语以及使用适当的发音字母指定其发音。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the platform infrastructure in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> and using the synthesizer voice implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常称为平台基础结构以响应<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>基于应用程序调用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>和使用由当前实现的合成语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>实例。

trans-unit.source: The value of `mediaType` is typically a MIME specification, as the SSML specification uses MIME for media specifications.
trans-unit.target: 值`mediaType`通常是一种 MIME 规范，SSML 规范用于 MIME 媒体规范处理。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> uses the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed in to load a lexicon from a resource.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>接口传入的要从资源加载词典。

trans-unit.source: It then stores a `System.IO.Stream` to the lexicon in a `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` instance, indexed by the lexicon URI.
trans-unit.target: 然后将存储`System.IO.Stream`到中词典`System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`实例，由词典 URI 编制索引。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at <paramref name="uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 要完全熟悉并能够处理存储在词典的实现负责<paramref name="uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it adds.
trans-unit.target: 实现还必须跟踪和管理，它将添加的所有词典的生存期。

trans-unit.source: Valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat" /> enumeration indicating the type of requested audio output format.
trans-unit.target: 指示请求的音频输出格式的类型 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat" /> 枚举的有效成员。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a <see langword="struct" /> containing detail setting for the audio format type requested by the <c>speakOutputFormat</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: 指向音频格式类型中包含由 <c>speakOutputFormat</c> 参数请求的详细信息设置的 <see langword="struct" /> 的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.
trans-unit.target: 返回对向合成器引擎请求支持特定输出格式的给定合成引擎响应支持的最佳匹配音频输出。

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid <see langword="IntPtr" /> instance referring to a <see langword="struct" /> containing detailed information about the output format.
trans-unit.target: 返回引用包含有关输出格式的详细信息 <see langword="IntPtr" /> 的有效 <see langword="struct" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `targetWaveFormat` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI, and the returned value should be allocated using `CoTaskMemAlloc`.
trans-unit.target: 用作结构`targetWaveFormat`并返回该方法应与兼容`WAVEFORMATEX`SAPI 下, 可用和返回的值应使用分配`CoTaskMemAlloc`。

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: `struct`必须提供功能等效于：

trans-unit.source: The sample implementation below validates selected inputs, using them if they are within tolerances, otherwise using default values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现验证所选的输入，如果它们容限内使用它们，否则使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Object inheriting from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> should examine the requested output format as specified by <paramref name="targetWaveFormat" /> and return the closest format that it supports.
trans-unit.target: 对象继承自<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />应检查按照指定的请求的输出格式<paramref name="targetWaveFormat" />并返回它所支持的最接近格式。

trans-unit.source: A valid instance of <see langword="System.Uri" /> indicating the location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: 指示词典信息位置的 <see langword="System.Uri" /> 的有效实例。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: 对由平台基础结构传入以允许访问基础结构资源的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> 接口的引用。

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the <see langword="Synthesizer" /><see langword="Voice" /> implemented by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 移除由当前 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> 实例实现的 <see langword="Synthesizer" /> <see langword="Voice" /> 当前加载的字典。

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations specified using an appropriate pronunciation alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 发音词典是集合的词或短语以及使用适当的发音字母指定其发音。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called in response to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> based applications calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> and using the synthesizer voice implemented by the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常称为以响应<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>基于应用程序调用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>和使用由当前实现的合成语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>实例。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> uses the lexicon URI to query an instance `System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary` for the `System.IO.Stream`, closes the stream and removes the uri referring to the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>词典 URI 用于查询实例`System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`为`System.IO.Stream`、 关闭流，并删除引用词典的 uri。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at <paramref name="uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 要完全熟悉并能够处理存储在词典的实现负责<paramref name="uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it removes.
trans-unit.target: 实现还必须跟踪和管理它会删除所有词典的生存期。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instances containing the text to be rendered into speech.
trans-unit.target: 包含呈现在语音中的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> 实例数组。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="IntPtr" /> pointing to a structure containing audio output format.
trans-unit.target: 指向包含音频输出格式结构的 <see langword="IntPtr" />。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> interface passed in by the platform infrastructure to allow access to the infrastructure resources.
trans-unit.target: 对由平台基础结构传入以允许访问基础结构资源的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> 接口的引用。

trans-unit.source: Renders specified <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> array in the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的输出格式呈现指定的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: The structure used as `waveHeader` and returned by the method should compatible with the `WAVEFORMATEX` available under SAPI.
trans-unit.target: 用作结构`waveHeader`并返回该方法应与兼容`WAVEFORMATEX`SAPI 下可用。

trans-unit.source: The `struct` must provide functionality equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: `struct`必须提供功能等效于：

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是从继承的自定义语音合成器实现的一部分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>，并使用了利用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>，和 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: 实现 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 接收的数组<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例并创建一个新数组的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例传递给`Speak`基础的合成引擎上的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>枚举值通过找到从<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>返回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>，实现

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 转换到 Britishisms Americanism 中要朗读的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>接口提供给实现支持<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary>事件类型，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>实例用于创建一个事件到创建合成进度表驱动器。

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用语音呈现引擎使用修改后<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>数组。

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesizer implements using <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> and <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> work as filters or intermediaries between synthesizer applications constructed using the platform infrastructure through the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Synthesis" /> namespace and underlying system speech synthesis engines.
trans-unit.target: 自定义语音合成器实现使用<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />和<see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />工作作为筛选器或使用平台基础结构的成员通过构造的合成器应用程序之间的中介<see cref="N:System.Speech.Synthesis" />命名空间和基础系统语音合成引擎。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" /> implementation:
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />实现：

trans-unit.source: Traps or modify aspects of the incoming <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> objects
trans-unit.target: 捕获或修改的传入方面<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />对象

trans-unit.source: Generates any necessary events using the site reference to a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> instance
trans-unit.target: 生成任何所需的事件使用的站点引用<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" />实例

trans-unit.source: Generates the actual synthesized speech.
trans-unit.target: 生成实际的合成的语音。

trans-unit.source: Generation of speech is most typically done by calling <c>Speak</c> on one of the speech rendering engines provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 生成语音最通常是通过调用<c>说话</c>呈现引擎由操作系统提供的语音之一上。

trans-unit.source: If one of the available speech rendering engines is not used, a object inheriting from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" /> must create its own speech rendering engine.
trans-unit.target: 如果用语音呈现引擎之一未使用，一个对象，该对象从继承<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />必须创建自己的语音呈现引擎。

trans-unit.source: Access to the <c>Speak</c> method on obtained using the registry and reflection.
trans-unit.target: 访问<c>说话</c>获得使用注册表和反射的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.#ctor(System.String)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon(System.Uri,System.String,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon(System.Uri,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />, <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat,System.IntPtr)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml" />，必须重写以下成员： <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.#ctor(System.String)" />， <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon(System.Uri,System.String,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />， <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon(System.Uri,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />， <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.GetOutputFormat(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeakOutputFormat,System.IntPtr)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak(System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment[],System.IntPtr,System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite)" />。
